name: Your Pen Pal
description:
"Take care, your new pen pal." 

Quarantine has become a mundane routine, until a mysterious letter is left by your bedroom window sill. The messenger notes that they're struggling with living alone during these trying times, and would like a pen pal to keep them entertained. What will you do?

Music and Sound Credits:

Main song - peractorum by cesisco (youtube/Tad On)(https://opengameart.org/content/8-bit-lofi-peractorum)

Freesounds:

matrixxx - select granted

sgrowe - fast paper rip

koops - gate squeak

gynation - paper flip

geroglp - slap

audio-dread - creepy-horn
